attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 7hrs & 20mins from capital to capital in great britain going at full motorway speed. This is an outrage as it costs businesses money & makes the north south divide more prominent. We propose that the government abolishes speed limits as going slow down an empty road is pointless, The large journey time could be potentially be halfed by going at twice at the speed (140mph)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
